Instruction: Slice the baguette into thin rounds and place them on a baking sheet.
Slice the brie cheese into thin slices.
Once the baguette rounds are toasted, top each with a slice of brie cheese.
Bake the crostini in the preheated oven for 3-5 minutes, or until the cheese is melted.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
Top each crostini with black raspberries.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with fresh thyme leaves.
Serve warm as an elegant side dish or appetizer.
